svg.text: Advanced AI Usage: From Surface Learning to Deep Mastery
How to Use AI as a Brutal Technical Sparring Partner

g.text: THE SOCRATIC DRILLING METHOD: AI AS HARSH EXAMINER
AI: "Calculate total FLOPs for one transformer layer."
AI: "Be precise. What are the exact dimensions at each step?"
AI: "You forgot the 2x factor for multiply-add. What about attention?"
AI: "Good. Now break down LayerNorm FLOPs. Why is it different?"
You: "LayerNorm is O(seq × d) not O(seq × d²)"
AI: "Why does LayerNorm use rsqrt instead of sqrt + divide?"
You: "One operation instead of two! rsqrt(x) vs 1.0/sqrt(x)"
How to Set Up Drilling Sessions
1. Start with a claim you think you understand:
2. Ask AI to probe without mercy:
"Test my understanding with increasingly hard questions"
• No looking up answers during session
• Explain your reasoning, not just answers
• When wrong, trace back to root misconception
• Build from first principles when stuck
The Goal: Not to pass, but to find every weakness
Q10: "Derive optimal tile size for cache" → Brutal
For "Unchanging" Knowledge (CPU arch, Maxwell's equations, algorithms):
designing one from scratch. What problems
"If I had infinite transistors but fixed
wire delay, how would I design memory?"
cliff at stride=64 but not stride=32?"
Result: Not just knowledge, but operational mastery
"I learn by building, not by reading"
Why This Works: Each iteration compounds
• You learn the specific thing you need RIGHT NOW
• Knowledge is immediately applied and tested
ADVANCED AI USAGE PATTERNS FOR DEEP MASTERY
Stop me when I say something wrong
"Walk me through how Vaswani et al
I needed to process sequences on
edge devices, what would I invent?"
EXAMPLE: COMPLETE TRANSFORMER FLOP DRILLING SESSION
Let's Calculate Every FLOP in a Transformer Layer
Calculate total FLOPs for one layer (forward pass)
Combining All Techniques for Maximum Growth
Each cycle: Deeper understanding, Faster implementation, Better teaching
